name: Live in Your Car
description:
EXT. THE MEAN STREETS OF NEO NEW WICHITA - HIGH NOON

In an Orwellian future, you have been evicted by your landlord for not paying rent. You are left with only your vehicle, your livelihood as an independent cabbie, and $35 to your name. Your life now adrift, you must grapple to regain control and navigate the urban labyrinth of Neo New Wichita to satisfy the eccentric demands of a bored but wealthy young professional. You must Live in Your Car.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Up and Down Arrows - Accelerate and Brake/Reverse

Left and Right Arrows - Drift

Space - Boost

Alt (hold) - View map

C - Advance dialogue

R - Reset

ESC - Quit

Also compatible with SNES game pad (premium experience) and other D-input controllers!

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING

Developed in Game Maker Studio over the course of two days at the ICT Game Jam by Chicken Engine: Michael Karpinski (artist and composer), Colton Pfannenstiel (lead programmer), and Matt Krehbiel (design). Special thanks to Ashley Karpinski (consultant).

Give us "@" shout on Twitter: @olegrieves (Matt), @kaizokurisu (Michael), and @bovicefosho (Colton).
